column4: could someone briefly direct me to an ubuntu repository discussion?
I have the breezy universe repositories in my sources.list, but I still can't install some packages that tell me they need the universe repository
it's in universe.  have you updated?
you could probably help us out more by pasting the exact error wording
: this is not a new install
can you think of anything that might have caused it?
: yes I had to shut down the computer by pressing 10 seconds the power button because the computer froze
i don't know to be honest.  one app freeze shouldn't cause entire system failure
: OK. I'm rebooting. I hope it will finally work. I don't want to use kde....
